prefs-2FA: Plain text shwon as the title of the tab to configure 2FA.
prefs-2FA-label: Description shown near the textbox where the user writes the OTP.
prefs-2FA-help: Plain text seen on user Special:Preferences#mw-prefsection-2FA to guide the user through the proccess of obtaining the OTP in the mobile phone app.
prefs-2FA-button-pair: Plain text associated with the pair button.
prefs-2FA-button-unpair: Plain text associated with the unpair button.
